item.title: visualizations
item.description: Most Common Allegations Against New York City Police Officers I've been digging through @propublica 's database of Civilian Complaints Against New York City Police Officers. What questions do you have of the data? Here's an #rstats circular packing of most common allegations by race. Code and link to data here: https://t.co/SlwSrTAYrK pic.twitter.com/VAQJviORlT — Isabella Vel√°squez (@ivelasq3) July 29, 2020 Donkey Kong High Score Competition Record Over Time I recently rewatched The King of Kong: A Fistful of Quarters and was inspired to make a chart of the record holders since the infamous Billy Mitchell üïπÔ∏è Merging my love of #rstats and video games (and got to use #cowplot to embed images too!
